A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Stimulating\, inspiring and lots of character interactions combined with traditional battle scenes make this the best of all 8 Star Wars movies. My 9 year old son and most of the audience were yelling/screaming with excitement on several parts. Loved it and apparently the critics do as well. Looks like the audience didn't so much\, but hey what can you expect from a general public who eat up fake news and live off of the internet lies and gossip? Can you really trust their judgement? Not in this case.
